review: Very pleased with this before I had to run cables from the TV to my kindle to be able to watch films etc,the stick cuts all that out plus other people in the room can help pick out films as well. So simple to set up even I could do it I am not tech savvy. Would highly recommend the stick good value.

author: Wendy Micolta

review: Very easy to set up & use.  I had it up in 10 minutes & it is hooked to my Amazon Prime so all of the shows that I had on my watchlist were already there.  I had read that there were some issues when not using the included HDMI extender so I set it up with it from the get go.  Haven't had any issues yet and I don't even have lightening speed internet.  It works better than watching on the computer which had more buffering issues.
author: Deb Cotter
